channel.title: The Bob Narley Show
channel.description: From Chicago, The Bob Narley Show features original uncensored Comedy Bits and Parody Songs in high quality stereo mp3 from musician/rock radio personality/actor Bob Narley.
channel.itunes:author: Bob Narley
channel.itunes:summary: From Chicago, The Bob Narley Show features original uncensored Comedy Bits and Parody Songs in high quality stereo mp3 audio from musician, rock radio personality, and actor, Bob Narley. This very popular Podcast thoroughly takes advantage of its FCC-Free restrictions and pushes the boundaries of comedy in the most unimaginable ways. Described by many as twisted, irreverent, and brilliant, listeners are catapulted into another world where anything can happen and nothing is out of bounds. FHM reviewed The Bob Narley Show Podcast as A great mix of music and bizaare content with its highest 5 star rating.
channel.itunes:subtitle: From Chicago, The Bob Narley Show features original uncensored Comedy Bits and Parody Songs in high quality stereo mp3 audio from musician, rock radio personality, and actor, Bob Narley

item.title: The Bob Narley Show Podcast 5
item.description: This episode features a special 2 part episode of the popular - Lets Rate the Pot, as well as a new bit called -The Confessional- where a catholic priest listens to the confessions of several sinners. Two parody commercials, a special news report, and The Killer Kona Buds finish off the show with - I Came On Your Daughter.
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's Rate The Pot - The Confessional - Arnie and the Devil
item.itunes:author: Bob Narley

Two parody commercials, a special news report, and The Killer Kona Buds finish off the show with -I Came On Your Daughter-.
